channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Marketing Operations
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Marketing Operations

item.title: CVE-2017-1119|2024-08-05T13:25:17.094Z -- ibm -- marketing%20operations
item.description: IBM Marketing Operations 9.1.0, 9.1.2, and 10.1 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted request to cause an error message to be returned containing the full root path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system. IBM X-Force ID: 121171.
